name: Dimension Dip
description:
GAME MIGHT BE LOUD! THERE IS A MUTE BUTTON IN TOP RIGHT CORNER!

Fight your enemies. Power ups and health restores will appear outside the play area. be sure to grab them but don't stay too long otherwise you'll be lost forever.

Top left bar shows how long you can go into the void. Don't spend too long in there.

Controls:
-arrow keys / WASD to move
-space / X to shoot

music: Juhani Junkala level 2 https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action

art: Kenney.nl
